title: Managing energy trading risk while delivering water in the desert with SNWA’s Mike Slattery
description: At the 2025 OATI Energy Conference, Mike Slattery a compliance officer at Southern Nevada Water Authority (SNWA), sat down to discuss his obligations regarding pricing, trading, compliance, and risk – all while still providing access to water in a desert.
